Highlights:

$TON inside Telegram: Our partnership powers Telegram‚Äôs digital economy‚Äî1B+ MAU, #1 crypto messaging platform. In the words of Pavel Durov, ‚ÄúToday, TON is the economic backbone of Telegram - much like a national currency powers a country‚Äôs economy.‚Äù https://x.com/durov/status/1952793786003886088

$TON‚Äôs Market Opportunity: $TON stands at a strategic inflection‚Äîonly just entering the US market, with unrivalled distribution through Telegram. Compared to peers, its potential is vast, positioning us as the public proxy in a ‚Äúwinner takes most‚Äù digital asset treasury landscape.

$TONX: Treasury Fundamentals & Thesis: We hold a significant stake in the circulating supply of $TON. Compared to other Digital Asset Treasuries, our $TON holdings set the stage for a meaningful contribution to the ecosystem and generate substantial staking rewards; we also have future plans to introduce proprietary staking infrastructure‚Äîlooking forward to capturing even more value and building with $TON.

What next for @tonstrat: We‚Äôre aiming to hold in excess of 5% of $TON supply, are exploring tokenizing $TONX stock on-chain, and thinking of ways to strengthen our ecosystem support. 
Excited for upcoming events in Korea and Singapore (Sept 22-26 and Oct 1-2), where @ManuelStotz will give two keynote speeches at KBW & Token 2049.

Mario x Manny
